spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct. Door to Bedroom-1 is correctly placed but the door to the toilet has an orientation mismatch relative to the bathroom wall layout. Window placement in Bedroom-1 and Balcony is consistent.

structural_fidelity.notes: There are minor hallucinations in wall thickness near the Utility entrance. All rooms are present, and adjacencies are preserved.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture scale is largely consistent. The kitchen countertop layout is slightly simplified compared to the plan's L-shape detail.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric projection and clean geometry. Lighting is soft and professional. Text overlays are clear but exhibit slight rendering artifacts in the font.

detected_errors.description: The swing and orientation of the toilet door do not perfectly align with the internal wall partitioning shown in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated structural thickness/pillar in the corner of the Utility area not specified in the 2D floor plan.
Text labels for rooms show slight compression artifacts and orientation skew relative to the floor plane.
